testcase.name: Kriya_login › KD-TC-5370: User Should be able to login with valid credentials
Kriya_login › KD-TC-5371: User Should be able to login with invalid credentials and show error
Kriya_login › KD-TC-5372: forget password should send a reset link in email to user with valid email

testcase.name: AuthorFlow › KD-TC-5398: Author should be able to attach pdf to the queries
AuthorFlow › KD-TC-5397: Author should be able to resolve the opened queries
AuthorFlow › KD-TC-5399: Author should be able to signoff the article
KD-TC-5370: User should able to login kriyadocs with valid credentails
References › KD-TC-5378: References Should be validated from pubmed/crossref after structure
References › KD-TC-5379: Untagged references should be highlighted in red coloured after structure
References › KD-TC-5380: User Should be able to insert a reference using DOI in editor
References › KD-TC-5381: User Should be able to insert a reference using pubmedid in editor
References › KD-TC-5382: User Should be able to insert a reference using pasting a reference in editor
References › KD-TC-5383: User Should be able to Delete a reference
References › KD-TC-5384: User Should be able to Cite a reference
References › KD-TC-5385: Reference reorder should work for numbered refernce citation as expected
